channel.title: NetBeans Screencasts and Video Demos
channel.description: Screencasts that show you all the cool features of NetBeans, the free and open-source IDE for Java development and scripting.

item.title: New and Noteworthy in NetBeans IDE 7.2
item.description: Discover what's new and improved in NetBeans IDE 7.2.

item.title: Creating a Touch Enabled SVG UI for Java ME Devices
item.description: Develop an application that works on most Java ME based touch screen devices using scalable vector graphics (SVG) user interface widgets in the NetBeans IDE.

item.title: Using TestNG in NetBeans IDE
item.description: This screencast demonstrates how to create and debug a TestNG test class in NetBeans IDE.

item.title: Using the Visual Debugger in NetBeans IDE
item.description: Use the Visual Debugger in NetBeans IDE to locate and debug the code for visual elements in your GUI application.

item.title: Smarty Support in NetBeans IDE for PHP
item.description: This screencast shows how to work with the Smarty PHP framework in NetBeans IDE.

item.title: Inspect and Transform Refactoring in NetBeans IDE 7.1
item.description: This screencast demonstrates the new Inspect and Transform refactoring feature in NetBeans IDE 7.1.

item.title: JDK 7 Support in NetBeans IDE 7.0
item.description: This screencast demonstrates the support for new JDK 7 language features in NetBeans IDE 7.0.

item.title: Deploying a Web App to Oracle WebLogic Server
item.description: This screencast shows support for the Oracle WebLogic server in NetBeans IDE. See how to register an instance of the server with the IDE and then deploy a Java EE 5 web application..
